alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 12:24AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with gusty wind will impact portions of Coconino and Yavapai Counties through 115 AM MST... At 1223 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles north of Yava to 9 miles northeast of Chino Valley to near Cornville. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Camp Verde, Chino Valley, Sedona, Prescott Valley, Clarkdale, Verde Village, Mcguireville, Village At Oak Creek, Prescott Airport, Bridgeport, Middle Verde, Junipine Resort, Garland`s Oak Creek Lodge, Williamson Valley, Page Springs, Slide Rock State Park, Yavapai County Fairgrounds, Perkinsville, Cottonwood and Lake Montezuma. This includes the following highways... Interstate 17 between mile markers 292 and 297. State Route 260 between mile markers 207 and 215. State Route 179 between mile markers 301 and 313. State Route 89 between mile markers 319 and 359. State Route 89A between mile markers 319 and 376, and between mile markers 379 and 397. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
